channel.title: Taken advice and built a pre-launch landing page. Feedback?
channel.description:
I've taken some advice from other people here (great stuff) and done what should have been done a while ago…built a landing page: [http://bit.ly/ABMcreate](http://bit.ly/ABMcreate)
Any feedback you've got for me would be amazing and I'd be more than happy to return the favor with a different perspective on your work.

item.title: Taken advice and built a pre-launch landing page. Feedback?
item.dc:creator: michaeljamescalkins
item.description:
Nice site, you get to the point and I understand what you’re doing.

I hate the scroll modifier.

Read full topic
item.source: Taken advice and built a pre-launch landing page. Feedback?

item.title: Taken advice and built a pre-launch landing page. Feedback?
item.dc:creator: aaronsransom
item.description:
Thank you! All of this is great feedback and all makes sense to me. Appreciate you taking the time to look at this closely.

Glad you pointed out the name bit. It’s just “Create” - nice to know that’s not clear.

Read full topic
item.source: Taken advice and built a pre-launch landing page. Feedback?

item.title: Taken advice and built a pre-launch landing page. Feedback?
item.dc:creator: kalenjordan
item.description:
Hey congrats on getting this up!

I like the emphasis you have on speaking to the needs of the small business owner.

I’m not sure how to pronounce the create/* thing. Might help to flesh that out.

The blue on gray background feels a bit too strong.

I’m not sure I’m clear on how it is that you’re changing the way web work gets done. Maybe you could flesh out the value prop / differentiation.

(Sent from phone)

Read full topic
item.source: Taken advice and built a pre-launch landing page. Feedback?
